chinese: 奖品
english: reward

chinese: 包大人收到了一份奖励他辛苦工作的礼物
english: lord bao receives a gift in reward for his hard work

chinese: 导火线，保险丝
english: fuse

chinese: 一旦导火线烧完，炸弹就会爆炸
english: once the fuse has burned the bomb will explode

chinese: 突然的
english: sudden

chinese: 气球突然爆了，吓了男孩一跳
english: the boy was scared by the sudden burst of the ballon

chinese: 最高潮
english: culmination

chinese: 赢得诺贝尔奖是他职业生涯的最高潮
english: winning the Nobel Prize was the culmination of his career

chinese: 风险
english: risk

chinese: 消防员冒着生命危险冲进火场
english: the fireman risks his life by running into the fire

chinese: 政府，治理
english: government

chinese: 当地政府的办公室就在这栋楼里
english: the offices of the local government are in this building

chinese: 皱眉
english: frown

chinese: 这个男人皱着眉，看起来不开心
english: the man is frowning and looks unhappy

chinese: 基础设施
english: infrastructure

chinese: 完善的基础设施包括交通、通信等
english: a good infrastructure includes transport communications etc

chinese: 稳定的
english: stable

chinese: 物价在一阵起伏后终于保持稳定了
english: the price finally became stable after some ups and downs

chinese: 遗产
english: legacy

chinese: 这座房子是他祖父留下的遗产
english: the house is a legacy left by his grandfather

chinese: 住宅的
english: residential

chinese: 住宅区和商业区是分开的
english: the residential area is separate from the business district

chinese: 融合
english: fusion

chinese: 这金属是由铜和铁融合制成的
english: the metal is formed by the fusion of copper and iron

chinese: 学术的
english: academic

chinese: 参加此学术会议的有学者，教授和博士生
english: the academic meeting includes scholars professors and PhD students

chinese: 提供，以...为条件
english: provided

chinese: 如果你先把家庭作业做完，你就可以看电视了
english: you may watch TV provided your homework is finished first
